attributes.action: Forfeit the human rights act for time serving criminals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any convicted criminal, murderer, mugger,rapist,paedophile or terrorist should automatically forfeit any right to the Human Rights Act, as this is now open to far to much abuse and the victim has been denied all rights and protection.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Forfeit the human rights act for time serving criminals."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15542.asp

Prime Minister's Office
